description:
Momotaro has to deal with another of his master`s hangovers and while out drinking run into an annoyed Hozuki. Later, chaos erupts in the Alcoholic`s Hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’ultime exemple de l’incompatibilité entre l’alcool et les femmes - Un ivrogne plein comme une outre
Sake to Onna de Dame ni Naru Kyuukyoku no Rei / Afurekaettekita Yopparai
The Ultimate Example of Ruin Through Wine and Women / Awash with Drunks Who Came Home
酒と女でダメになる究極の例 / 溢れ返ってきたヨッパライ
